triggers.label: Timer Trigger
triggers.description: This triggers a rule based on a timer

configDescriptions.name: time
configDescriptions.label: Duration
configDescriptions.description: A duration before this timer expires with the pattern hh:mm:ss. The shortest duration is therefore 1 second, the longest is 99 hours.

configDescriptions.name: randomizeTime
configDescriptions.label: Duration Upper Bound
configDescriptions.description: An optional upper bound duration before this timer expires with the pattern hh:mm:ss. A random duration between Duration and Duration Upper Bound will be chosen.

configDescriptions.name: repeat
configDescriptions.label: Repeat
configDescriptions.description: You can make this timer a recurring timer by setting a value above 1. The default is 1. If you set a value below 0 like -1 this timer will be repeated indefinitely
